title: Cory Booker arrives at Ohio debate with Rosario Dawson
text:
Cory Booker was spotted arriving at the Democratic presidential debate in Ohio clutching his actress girlfriend Rosario Dawson's hand.

It is the first of the four Democratic debates that the New Jersey senator's girlfriend has attended.

Booker and Dawson smiled for cameras as they arrived together at Otterbein University in Westerville on Tuesday evening.

There was a seat reserved for the actress in the second row of the debate hall prior to it getting underway.

Cory Booker was spotted arriving at the Democratic presidential debate in Westerville, Ohio on Tuesday clutching his actress girlfriend Rosario Dawson's hand

She was seated between Booker's New Hampshire director and Doug Emhoff, who is the husband of fellow candidate Sen. Kamala Harris.

Dawson was noticeably absent from the first three debates in June, July and September.

She has been filming a new project in New Mexico.

They were spotted together at the Los Angeles premiere of environmental documentary The Need to Grow last week. Booker was at the premiere supporting his girlfriend who narrates the documentary.

The couple also attended the premiere of Zombieland Double Tap in Hollywood last week.

The couple only went public with their relationship in March and they made their first joint appearance in June when Booker was interviewed by renowned Drag Queen RuPaul.

Booker has previously spoken of his romance with Dawson while out on the campaign trail.

It is the first of the four Democratic debates that the New Jersey senator's girlfriend has attended

Booker and Dawson smiled for cameras as they arrived together at Otterbein University in Westerville on Tuesday evening

During a CNN town hall in South Carolina back in March, Booker revealed how he met his girlfriend at a political fundraiser for former NAACP leader Ben Jealous.

Booker said Dawson 'didn't give me the time of day' but he worked up the courage to ask for her phone number the next time they met.

'I'm a United States senator and I had to get up the courage to walk up to her and ask her for her phone number,' he said. 'And this doesn't make me nervous, but that made me nervous.'

It remains unclear just how long the couple dated before Dawson broke the news while she was being followed by TMZ's cameras at Reagan International Airport in Washington DC after visiting Booker.

Dawson told paparazzi she was 'very much' in a relationship with Booker, calling him a 'wonderful human being'.

'So far, so wonderful,' she said. 'It's good to spend some time together when we can. We're very busy.'

Neither Booker nor Dawson has been married.

Dawson has a daughter, Lola, who she adopted when the child was 11. Booker does not have any children.
description: Cory Booker was spotted arriving at the Democratic presidential debate in Westerville, Ohio on Tuesday clutching his actress girlfriend Rosario Dawson's hand.
